newsitem.title: USA: Tekni-Plex Inc issues $75 mln in 10-year debt.
newsitem.headline: Tekni-Plex Inc issues $75 mln in 10-year debt.

text.p: The following debt issue from specialty packaging company Tekni-Plex Inc was priced in the 144A private placement market on Tuesday, according to a high-yield market source.
The issue priced with an 11.25 percent coupon, behind initial price talk of 11.00 percent, the source said.
J.P. Morgan Securities was lead manager on the deal.
TYPE SNR SUB NOTES ISS PRICE 100.00 FIRST PAY DATE 10/01/97 LAST MOODY'S B3 YIELD 11.25 PCT PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL
LAST S&P B-MINUS SPREAD 435 BP CALLABLE NON-CALL FIVE
Note: three year equity call for 33 percent with a minimum
outstanding principal of $60 million. ((--U.S. Corporate Bond Unit, 212 859-1672))
